key_features.grid_position: Strong negative correlation with podium (lower grid = higher podium probability)
key_features.driver_history: Driver historical performance should be included

missing_data.sprint_results: Sprint results only available for recent years
missing_data.qualifying: Some historical races may lack qualifying data
missing_data.placeholders: FastF1 features (lap_time_variance, throttle_variance, etc.) are placeholders

recommendations: Create rolling historical features (last N races) for drivers and constructors
Engineer grid position features (top 3, top 10, etc.)
Include driver age and experience features
Handle missing data appropriately (sprint results, qualifying)
